static unsigned char Font5x7[] = {

	0x00, 0x00, 0x5F, 0x00, 0x00,// !
	0x00, 0x07, 0x00, 0x07, 0x00,// "
	0x14, 0x7F, 0x14, 0x7F, 0x14,// #
	0x24, 0x2A, 0x7F, 0x2A, 0x12,// $
	0x23, 0x13, 0x08, 0x64, 0x62,// %
	0x36, 0x49, 0x55, 0x22, 0x50,// &

	0x00, 0x1C, 0x22, 0x41, 0x00,// (
